text:
[Verse]
Running through the endless fields
Hearts that never need to yield
Chasing colors in the sky
We won't stop till we fly high

[Verse 2]
Holding hands and making plans
Lost inside our candy lands
Every shadow fades away
In the light we dance and play

[Chorus]
Oh we are chasing rainbows
Eyes wide open where the wind blows
Feeling magic in our feet
Every step we are complete

[Verse 3]
Dreams are painted in the night
Stars that guide us with their light
Whispers of a world so new
In this moment it's just me and you

[Bridge]
We'll build a castle out of dreams
Nothing here is what it seems
Every color every hue
Is a path to something true

[Chorus]
Oh we are chasing rainbows
Eyes wide open where the wind blows
Feeling magic in our feet
Every step we are complete
title: Chasing Rainbows
